channel.title: Cryptocurrencies on Just A Data Geek
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptocurrencies on Just A Data Geek

item.title: My Thoughts On Bitcoin
item.description: I enjoy listening to/reading the stories on the various business news outlets about cryptocurrencies – I have been casually reading about blockchain technology and its different applications, but that is not the focus of this post. While I am not an “expert” on cryptocurrencies, I have come to the opinion that they are not really currencies. I see them as a commodity as opposed to a currency. Why? Like some other commodities, it is “mined”.
